All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AudioOptions
Class for displaying the audio options in the game
Cannon
The Cannon class represents a cannon object in the game.
Constants
This class contains various constants used throughout the game.
Constants.Directions
Constant representing directions as numbers.
Constants.EnemyConstants
Constants related to enemies in the game.
Constants.Environment
Constants related to environmental elements in the game.
Constants.ObjectConstants
Constants related to various objects in the game environment.
Constants.PlayerConstants
Constants related to player actions and states in the game.
Constants.Projectiles
Constants related to projectiles in the game.
Constants.UI
Constants related to user interface elements in the game.
Constants.UI.Buttons
Constants related to buttons in the game UI.
Constants.UI.PauseButtons
Constants related to pause buttons in the game UI.
Constants.UI.URMButtons
Constants related to URM (user response mechanism) buttons in the game UI.
Constants.UI.VolumeButtons
Constants related to volume control buttons in the game UI.
Crabby
The Crabby class represents a specific type of enemy in the game.
Enemy
The Enemy class represents a generic enemy in the game.
EnemyManager
The EnemyManager class manages the enemies within the game.
Entity
The Entity class represents a generic entity in the game.
Game
The main class responsible for managing the game loop and controlling game states.
GameContainer
The GameContainer class represents a container object in the game.
GameObject
The GameObject class represents a generic game object.
GameOptions
The GameOptions class represents the game options state, where players can adjust settings like audio.
GameOverOverlay
Represents the overlay displayed when the game ends.
GamePanel
The GamePanel class represents the panel where the game graphics are rendered.
Gamestate
The Gamestate enum represents the different states of the game.
GameWindow
The GameWindow class represents the window where the game is displayed.
HelpMethods
Utility methods for various operations in the game.
KeyboardInputs
Handles keyboard inputs by implementing the KeyListener interface.
Level
Represents a game level.
LevelCompletedOverlay
Represents the overlay displayed when a level is completed.
LevelManager
Manages the levels in the game.
LoadSave
Utility class for loading and saving various resources such as sprite atlases and level images.
MainClass
The MainClass is the entry point of the application.
Menu
The Menu class represents the main menu state of the game.
MenuButton
Represents a button used in the game menu.
MouseInputs
Handles mouse input events including mouse clicks and mouse movements.
ObjectManager
The ObjectManager class manages all the game objects such as potions, containers, spikes, cannons, and projectiles.
PauseButton
Represents a pause button used in the user interface.
PauseOverlay
Represents the pause overlay displayed during the game.
Player
The Player class represents the player entity in the game.
Playing
The Playing class represents the state of the game where the player is actively playing.
Potion
Represents a potion object in the game.
Projectile
Represents a projectile fired by cannons in the game.
SoundButton
Represents a sound button used in the pause menu.
Spike
Represents a spike object in the game.
State
Represents a state in the game.
Statemethods
Defines the methods that must be implemented by classes representing different game states.
UrmButton
Represents a button used in the UI.
VolumeButton
Represents a volume control button used in the UI.
